sentences.en: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.cn: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

sentences.en: After the hour-long service, his body was taken to a cemetery in the south of the city.
sentences.cn: 长达1小时的宗教仪式之后，他的遗体被送往城南的一座公墓里。

sentences.en: Last year, however, one candidate produced a half-hour-long advertisement.
sentences.cn: 然而，去年，一位候选人制作了一个半小时的广告。
